item.title: EventArgsConverter
item.description: The implementation and usage of the EventToCommand behavior is always strongly encouraged when developing an MVVM application as it provides a logical separation of concerns. However many implementations of the behavior come with the caveat, they cause a ViewModel to have knowledge of View specific types as well as causing a ViewModel to be directly dependent on the View. To resolve that concern, Catel provides support for an EventArgsConverter that can be attached to an EventToCommand binding.
